english.segment1: Never thought it would be me. Living in a shattered dream. How could this be in for me?. What I wouldn't give to have. A life to live, a day to plan. Instead I'll be forever seventeen
english.segment2: Could have lived out every dream. I could have been most anything
english.segment3: Can someone wake me up?. I haven't lived yet. I'm only seventeen. God, did you forget?. I'm just a baby. And I don't wanna be. Forever seventeen
english.segment4: I'll never have a bed to make. A test to take, a summer day. I'll always be forever seventeen. I could have had a family. If things had worked out differently. Instead I'll be forever seventeen
english.segment5: Could I have just one more day. A chance to learn from my mistakes
english.segment6: Can someone wake me up?. I haven't lived yet. I'm only seventeen. God, did you forget?. I'm just a baby. And I don't wanna be. Forever seventeen
english.segment7: In a matter of a moment. Life fell before my eyes. And now I'm looking at the meaning of. The miracle of life. Where are we going without even knowing. The answers deep inside
english.segment9: So don't give up. You haven't lived yet. You're only seventeen. And God did not forget. You're just a baby
